key_points: An Instagram user, @NinaCelie, claims she saw Gabby Petito and Brian Laundrie arguing at the Merry Piglett's Mexican Grill in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, on Aug. 27, 2021.
Celie's boyfriend, referred to as Matt, reportedly has an 'insane photographic memory' and remembered the couple's argument.
The last time Petito spoke with her mother was on Aug. 25, according to a timeline compiled by ABC News.
During the incident, Petito was reportedly hysterically crying and Laundrie was seen arguing with the restaurant's hostess and speaking to the manager multiple times.
Celie recounted that she and her boyfriend did not think of the incident again until her boyfriend suddenly remembered it on a Wednesday morning.
Celie described Laundrie's behavior as 'violent' and 'relentless' during his interactions with the hostess.
The FBI is seeking information from anyone who was in the area from Aug. 27 to Aug. 30, 2021, asking them to upload any potential evidence.
Laundrie returned home in Petito's van on Sept. 1 without her.
Petito was reported missing by her family on Sept. 11, and Laundrie was reported missing by his family on Sept. 17.
Petito's body was found on Sept. 19 in the Bridger-Teton National Park and was identified on Sept. 21.
